department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Public Works and Government Services Canada requires a contractor to provide HVAC maintenance services.
description: _Public Works and Government Services Canada requires a contractor to provide HVAC maintenance services on five (5) buildings throughout the National Capital Region to ensure the integrity and performance of the systems as indicated in the scope of work._
tags: Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning Maintenance & Inspection Services
full_summary:
=====================

**Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

**Tendering Procedures**

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the provision of HVAC maintenance services to five buildings within the National Capital Region (NCR). Interested bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Trade Opportunity Details**

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW-FK-329-81421
* **Solicitation Number:** EJ196-230037/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-09T14:00:00

**Scope of Work**

The successful bidder will be required to provide HVAC maintenance services to five buildings located in the NCR, as outlined in the scope of work. The contract will be valid for a period of 5 years.

**Security Requirements**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and requires personnel and organization security screening at the SECRET level. Bidders must comply with the security requirements outlined in Part 6 of the RFP.

**Mandatory Site Visit**

A mandatory 1-day bidders' site visit is required. Bidders must complete a personnel security screening prior to accessing protected information, assets, or sites.

**Submission Guidelines**

Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in Part 2 of the RFP. All submissions must be made in either English or French.

**Supporting Documents**

The supporting documents for this RFP are available on the Canadabuys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/07/709a5edd3cb7e695a3fc87ee472f23c1/ABES.PROD.PW__FK.B329.E81421.EBSU001.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/07/709a5edd3cb7e695a3fc87ee472f23c1/ABES.PROD.PW__FK.B329.E81421.EBSU001.PDF) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/73147b01e808171dd7ca4fde09843ce1/ABES.PROD.PW__FK.B329.E814
